unnormalised: I remember feeling so lost after my engineering exams at IIT Delhi. Like, total 3 Idiots style existential crisis! Then my therapist recommended this app. It helped me track my mood swings – like after a particularly stressful day arguing with chacha ji about rishtas. It's still early days but it's helping, slowly slowly. Feeling a little more shanti each day.
